product_name: Canari Hybrid Bike Shorts - Women's - 2012 Special Buy
long_description: Perfect for cycling excursions, the Canari Hybrid Bike shorts offer superior in-saddle comfort. Nylon/spandex blend fabric stretches to fit, and is moisture wicking and quick drying. 8-panel construction for a great fit; mesh side panels for increased ventilation. Built-in chamois for comfort. Elastic at hems keeps shorts in place. Elastic waistband for a perfect fit. Special buy.
short_description: Perfect for cycling excursions, the Canari Hybrid Bike shorts offer superior in-saddle comfort.
